name: YouthProAktiv
goal: YOUTHPROAKTIV is an organization aiming at creating a generation of proactive individuals ready to invest their talents for the BETTERMENT OF SOCIETY by starting their own business and CREATING JOBS for themselves and others.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
YouthProAktiv is a global coalition of young people advocating for pro-activity and entrepreneurship friendly policies. We call for educational reform that would equip young people with professional and entrepreneurial skills necessary for the labor market.

We work closely within the Committee of CULT, EMPL, ITRE, the Youth Intergroup, and the EU40 group.

We work closely with MEPs such us Pilar del Castillo & Brando Bonifei for the implementation of the DOIT Project.

We work closely with the MEP Miroslav RADAČOVSKÝ for the implementation of a European Audiovisual Trust Label.

We work closely with DG EACEA, GROW and CONNECT.
